questionTitle: The mangoes stayed on the  ___  (shelf) for three weeks and now they are damaged.
Elephant  ___  (calf) can weigh up to two tons.
The hunter followed the spoors of the animal's  ___ (hoof) in the sand and caught him.
The wind blew off many  ___  (roof) last week.
The court has not got clear  ___  (proof) to condemn the accused.
The paper is too large.You must cut it into 2  ___  (half).
